ygData.subject: Re: --== Read Please ==--
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Mr White, I would love to help you out with your newbie site, I have actually been petitionong them to let us have a new trade skill where we could write
ygData.messageBody:
"MR. WHITE" wrote:

> From: "MR. WHITE" <azdrain@...>
>
> Greetings friends, a couple of friends and I are creating a new
> EverQuest site dedicated to helping newbie and for people to have
> somewhere to go where you can easily access maps or guides for every
> class and zone.
>
> I am looking for writers and anything else (read below) to help out with
>
> this page
>
> I would REALLY appreciate anyone interested to send me an editorial,
> article, comic strip, artwork, essay, maps, drawing or anything having
> to do with EQ
>
> Drop me a line at azdrain@... or ICQ 1714044 if you are interested
> If you play on the Ralloz Zek or Xegony server I'm sure I could give you
>
> some nice items or cash in game for your time.
>
> Thanx
> Banez
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com

Mr White,
I would love to help you out with your newbie site, I have actually been
petitionong them to let us have a new trade skill where we could write books
and such as guids for people or other things, I am not the most experienced
adventurer my highest chracter being only a lvl 7 ranger on quellious but I
would be glad to help in any way possible
